biography.bio: Juan Carlos Calabró was born on February 3, 1934 in Buenos Aires, Argentina. He was an actor and writer, known for Champions of Life (1999), Johnny Tolengo, el majestuoso (1987) and El contra (2003). He was married to Coca. He died on November 5, 2013 in Buenos Aires.
biography.name: Juan Carlos Calabró

biography.bio: Very handsome and muscular Mexican leading man of Spanish origin, on-screen from the mid-1960s. Ironically, in his debut film he played a masked wrestler and his face was never shown. Rivero soon became a sex symbol and a major box-office star, and was called by Hollywood to star with John Wayne in Howard Hawks's Rio Lobo (1970). Since the 1980s he has worked only occasionally in Mexican films and soap operas -- he has lived in Southern California for more than a decade -- but shows up in international productions, sometimes billed as "George Rivero."
biography.name: Jorge Rivero

biography.bio: Nelly Beltrán was born on August 29, 1925 in Buenos Aires, Argentina. She was an actress, known for Pajarito Gómez (1965), Abierto día y noche (1981) and Los fierecillos indomables (1982). She was married to Maurice Jouvet. She died on December 2, 2007 in Buenos Aires.
biography.name: Nelly Beltrán

biography.bio: Susana Dosamantes was born on January 9, 1948 in Guadalajara, Jalisco, Mexico as Susana Rue Riestra. She is an actress, known for Rio Lobo (1970), Más negro que la noche (1975) and El placer de la venganza (1988). She was previously married to Enrique Rubio.
biography.name: Susana Dosamantes

biography.bio: Tincho Zabala was born on February 4, 1923 in Montevideo, Uruguay. He was an actor, known for Endless Summer (1998), The Strange Lady (1989) and Ne meurs pas sans me dire où tu vas (1995). He died on February 23, 2001 in Buenos Aires, Argentina.
biography.name: Tincho Zabala

biography.bio: Pablo Alarcón was born on September 9, 1946 in Pellegrini, Buenos Aires, Argentina as Rodolfo Francisco Marabotto. He is an actor, known for Regalo del cielo (1993), Desesperadas por el aire (1998) and Herencia de amor (1981). He was previously married to Claribel Medina and Mónica Jouvet.
biography.name: Pablo Alarcón

biography.placeOfBirth: Autonomous City of Buenos Aires, Argentina
biography.bio: Maria Valenzuela is very well remembered for several leading characters she has played during her wonderful and busy career. Actress of movies, television, and theater, she has not stopped working since she was a child. In fact, she has played many characters as a leading actress in a lot of soap operas such as "La cunada", "Vos y Yo Toda la Vida", "Barracas al sur", "El Infiel", and "El tema es el amor" among others. Also, she has played a memorable character in Alta Comedia, 1991 in the episode" La Cancion de Sara". In 2003, she played one of the main characters of thewell known show " Costumbres Argentinas". In 2002, Maria Valenzuela went through a very painful experience when learning that her daughter was very ill. Fortunately, after several weeks her daughter recovered very well. She thanked the media, the public, and close friends for all the emotional support she and her daughter had received.
biography.name: María Valenzuela

biography.bio: Carlos Del Burgo is an actor, known for Alliance by a Progress (1971), La civilización está haciendo masa y no deja oir (1974) and Amante para dos (1981).
biography.name: Carlos Del Burgo

biography.bio: Alicia Zanca was born on April 23, 1955 in Argentina. She was an actress, known for El mismo amor, la misma lluvia (1999), Los amores de Laurita (1986) and Secretos compartidos (1998). She was married to Gustavo Garzón. She died on July 23, 2012 in Buenos Aires, Argentina.
biography.name: Alicia Zanca

biography.bio: Ricardo Darín was born in Buenos Aires, Argentina, on January 16, 1957. He works since he was a little boy, and has obtained with the years a remarkable evolution from soap opera gallant and tv comedies to an excellent leading figure of the most importants Argentinian movies. At the age of 10 he made his debut in a play along with his parents, actor Ricardo Darín Sr., and actess Renée Roxana. He acted for several years in TV series (such as Alta Comedia and Estación Retiro), where he reached popularity as a young leading actor in different soap operas, specially in Alberto Migre's productions. In the 90s, he achieved a great success in the TV comedy "Mi Cuñado" (1993), in which he co-starred with Luis Brandoni. He never left theater and continued acting in plays like "Sugar", "Extraña Pareja", "Taxi", "Algo en Común" and "Art". At that time, he directed plays and movies like "He nacido en la ribera", "La Rabona" y "Los Exitos del Amor". The first time the critic emphasized his performance was in the movie "Perdido por Perdido" (1993), Alberto Lecchi's debut as a film director. Then, he played in "El Faro" (1998), "El Mismo Amor La Misma Lluvia" (1999), and "Nueve Reinas" (2000), brilliantly portraying Marcos. Once again, he colaborated with director Eduardo Mignona when he portrayed Domingo Santaló in "La Fuga" (2001). In 2001 he played Rafael Belvedere in "El Hijo de la Novia" (nominated in the foreign language category at the 2002 Oscars), crowning his career. Currently (2005), he is on tour with the play "Art" all over the world. He lives with his wife, Florencia Bas, and his children, Ricardo Jr. and Clara.
biography.name: Ricardo Darín

biography.bio: Leonardo Jury is an actor, known for Abierto día y noche (1981) and Las vacaciones del amor (1981).
biography.name: Leonardo Jury

biography.bio: Elena Cruz was born on November 27, 1926 in Argentina. She is an actress and writer, known for Amor libre (1969), Contigo y aquí (1974) and Un tranvía llamado Deseo (1956). She was previously married to Fernando Siro.
biography.name: Elena Cruz

biography.placeOfBirth: Villa Ballester, Pcia. Buenos Aires, Argentina
biography.bio: Fernando Siro was born on October 5, 1931 in Villa Ballester, Pcia. Buenos Aires, Argentina as Francisco Ángel Ludusid. He was an actor and director, known for ¿Dónde estás amor de mi vida que no te puedo encontrar? (1992), Amor libre (1969) and Perdido por perdido (1993). He was married to Elena Cruz. He died on September 4, 2006 in Buenos Aires, Argentina.
biography.name: Fernando Siro

biography.bio: Camila Perissé was born on January 1, 1952 in Mar del Plata, Argentina. She is an actress, known for Los gatos (Prostitución de alto nivel) (1985), Esa provinciana (1983) and La clínica del Dr. Cureta (1987).
biography.name: Camila Perissé

biography.bio: Jorge Martínez was born on March 24, 1947 in Buenos Aires, Argentina. He is an actor and writer, known for The Strange Lady (1989), Little Raoul (1975) and Los irrompibles (1975). He has been married to Elluz Peraza since 2001. He was previously married to Alejandra Gavilanes.
biography.name: Jorge Martínez
